item.title: Cloud forensics: Why enabling Microsoft Azure Storage Account logs matters
item.description: Co-authors - Christoph Dreymann - Shiva P Introduction Azure Storage Accounts are frequently targeted by threat actors. Their goal is to exfiltrate sensitive data to an external infrastructure under their control. Because diagnostic logging is not always fully enabled by default, valuable evidence of their malicious actions may be lost. With this blog, we will explore realistic attack scenarios and demonstrate the types of artifacts those activities generate. By properly enabling Microsoft Azure Storage Account logs investigators gain a better understanding of the scope of the incident. The...
